discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
Here is more feedback on compiling CoqEAL with MathComp for Coq 8.5:

After pinning `coq-mathcomp-ssreflect` to use this PR, I recompiled `coq-mathcomp-field.1.6.4` and paramcoq for Coq 8.5, then prepended `From mathcomp` at line
https://github.com/CoqEAL/CoqEAL/blob/cc2799ecf2883f1ef3e4de48e2d00e1965b3fcdb/refinements/refinements.v#L7

Then FYI the compilation of CoqEAL went farther than before, but failed at line
https://github.com/CoqEAL/CoqEAL/blob/cc2799ecf2883f1ef3e4de48e2d00e1965b3fcdb/refinements/refinements.v#L375
with the `Error: Unknown interpretation for notation "( _ in _ )".`, so this amounts to issue #62

commits.author: erikmd
commits.message: Update v8.5 plugin to fix math-comp/math-comp#61
